name: postiz
description: Postiz is a self-hosted social media management tool to schedule posts, collaborate with teams, and track engagement across platforms like Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn.
features: Multi-platform scheduling: Schedule posts across Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, and other social networks.
Content calendar: Visualize scheduled posts on a calendar with drag-and-drop rescheduling.
Team collaboration: Work with team members using roles, permissions, and approval workflows.
Media library: Store and organize images, videos, and other media assets for reuse across posts.
Post templates: Create reusable post templates to maintain consistent messaging and branding.
Analytics tracking: Monitor post performance with engagement metrics, reach, and click-through rates.
Bulk scheduling: Upload and schedule multiple posts at once using CSV import or batch creation.
Hashtag management: Save and organize hashtag groups for quick insertion into posts.
Preview mode: Preview how posts will appear on each platform before publishing.
Queue management: Set up posting queues that automatically publish content at optimal times.
URL shortening: Automatically shorten URLs in posts with tracking for click analytics.
Time zone support: Schedule posts for different time zones to reach global audiences effectively.
